# General

- Reformatted the hero selection on-screen text to:
  - Print whether the selected class is a **Warrior class**
  - Have the "Click the Green..." text to be on a new line
- Updated the system that processes damage events in TBR
- Updated the tooltip format for all forges
- Disabled the hold functionality for the **DPS UI**'s armor and magic resist adjustments. This is because Wc3 patch 1.33 broke the functionality

# Items
- **All Relics** (Champion's Armory) have their:
  - Level requirement decreased to 180 <small>(from 200)</small>
  - Purchase costs decreased to 75,000 gold and 75,000 crafting materials <small>(both were previously 100,000)</small>
- **All Olympian Relics** (Master Metalsmith Heletes) have their forging costs increased to 125,000 gold and 125,000 crafting materials <small>(both were previously 100,000)</small>
- Tweaked the wording of **Wizard's Respite**'s (Metalsmith Theron) mana regeneration effect
- **Book of Skill Increase** (Books and Sphinx) now sets the levelled spell's level instead of increasing it. This is not under <u>Bug Fixes</u> because it does not address the underlying UI bug, see [Known Bugs]

## Wraithblade <small>(Champion's Armory)</small>
- Level requirement decreased to 180 (from 200).
- Removed the 30% Mana Regeneration stat bonus
- Added the **Wraithtouched** passive:

> *Wraithtouched*—Auto-attacks have a 10% chance to fill the target with maddening visions causing 0.25 Intelligence magical damage over 4 seconds.

## Ares' Bloodthirsty Spear <small>(Olympian Relic)</small>
- Included an apostrophe to the item's name
- Reworked the "Regenerate 0.35% Maximum Health on auto-attack" effect to the **Eternal Hunger** passive:

> *Eternal Hunger*—Continually lose 0.75% Maximum Health per second. Regenerate the greater of 0.35% Maximum Health or 5% damage dealt on auto-attack. *Eternal Hunger* cannot decrease your health below 1% Maximum Health.

- Reworked the active self-50% roar effect to the **Hunt or be Hunted** active:<br>

> *Hunt or be Hunted*—Invoke Ares' spirit increasing auto-attack damage by 75% and tripling the health regenerated by *Eternal Hunger* for 10 seconds.<br>
> Cooldown: 30 seconds.

## Immortal Armor of Hephaestus <small>(Olympian Relic)</small>
- Increases Mana Regeneration by 25 Mana per second. (Previously 65 Mana per second)
- Replaced the "Regenerates 0.66% Maximum Health" effect with **Aphrodite's Favor** (Goldsmith)'s <u>Vivid Regeneration</u> effect.

> *Vivid Regeneration*—Grants Health Regeneration per second depending on Maximum Health:<br>
> &nbsp; • ≤ 24999: Regenerate 2% Maximum Health.<br>
> &nbsp; • ≤ 49999: Regenerate 1% Maximum Health.<br>
> &nbsp; • ≥ 50000: Regenerate 0.5% Maximum Health.

# Bug Fixes

- **Mage's War Staff** (Weaponsmith) now grants the stated Intelligence bonus
- Adjusted **Medusa**'s trigger region so that it properly starts the bossfight for heroes that hug the right-hand side's wall
- The linear boss mechanics for **Sphinx** (Barbaric Plains), **Goretusk** (Tribal Village), and **Manslayer** (Minotaur Burrows) no longer groups every enemy unit on the map 
- **Helios**' (Hyperion) Fire Blast now targets enemy heroes properly again
- Adjusted a spawn region in the **Southern Highlands** to prevent mobs from spawning on the cliff
- Reverted the fountain underneath the **Frost Wyrm** familiar (Athens) to the model file used in Wc3 Patch 1.32
- Adjusted the size of the **DPS UI** (Sedah Scarecrow) text boxes to account for the new font size used in Wc3 Patch 1.33

# Known Bugs {#Known}
- Using the **DPS UI** to adjust the armour value while <u>Break</u>, <u>Thunderbolt</u>, or <u>Rend Armor</u> is active will increase the base armour value of the <u>Sedah Scarecrow</u>
- **Custom UI buttons** found in the <u>DPS UI</u>, <u>Book of Skill Increase</u>, <u>Book of Skill Reset</u>, and <u>Backpack Skills</u> may lock the player out of using them under unknown circumstances
